answers.a: slip fault in which the block below the fault has moved downward relative to the block below
answers.b: slip fault in which the block below the fault has moved upward relative to the block below
answers.c: slip fault in which the block above the fault has moved downward relative to the block below
answers.d: slip fault in which the block above the fault has moved upwards relative to the block below

answers.a: slip fault in which the upper block, above the fault plane, moves up and over the lower block
answers.b: slip fault in which the upper block, below the fault plane, moves up and over the lower block
answers.c: slip fault in which the below block, above the fault plane, moves up and over the lower block
